history.proof: intros a b Q Ha Hb. unfold Cb in Ha, Hb. destruct a as [a Ca], b as [b Cb]. unfold spolyp. simpl. unfold spolyf. shelve.

ctx: intros a b Q Ha Hb.
destruct a as [a Ca], b as [b Cb].
exceptions.tactic: exists (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b Ca Cb).
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

ctx: intros a b Q Ha Hb.
destruct a as [a Ca], b as [b Cb].
exceptions.exn: Tactic failure: The relation (CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec) is not a declared reflexive relation. Maybe you need to require the Coq.Classes.RelationClasses library.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), Cb a Q -> Cb b Q -> Cb (spolyp a b) Q

Premises:
spolyp = fun p q : poly A0 eqA ltM => let (x, x0) := p in (let (x, Cpx) := q in fun (x0 : list (Term A n)) (Cpx0 : canonical A0 eqA ltM x0) => exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec x x0 Cpx Cpx0) (spolyf_canonical A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os x x0 Cpx Cpx0)) x x0 : poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM

reduce_inv : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q
reduceplus_skip : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)
CombLinear_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p
CombLinear_reduceplus : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p
CombLinear_reducestar : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p
irreducible_eqp_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q
spolyf_pO : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> forall (a : list (Term A n)) (Ca : canonical A0 eqA ltM a), eqP A eqA n (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a a Ca Ca) (pO A n)
reduce0_reducestar : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists t : list (Term A n), reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p t

```  
intros a b Q Ha Hb. unfold Cb in Ha, Hb. destruct a as [a Ca], b as [b Cb].
unfold spolyp.
simpl. unfold spolyf. simpl.
exists (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b Ca Cb). reflexivity.
```

original: intros a b Q Ha Hb. unfold Cb in Ha, Hb. destruct a as [a Ca], b as [b Cb]. unfold spolyp. simpl. unfold spolyf. simpl. exists (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b Ca Cb). reflexivity.
